name: ERegia 2 ESE - EDM
short_description:
Reference-transformation for keeping control on your manuscript data before ingestion into Europeana via The European Library.
Modular approach to converting multiple inputformats (TEI ; Marc21 ; EAD ; Mets/Mods) to ESE 3.4.1 and EDM.
Developed by Stefanie Gehrke within the scope of Europeana Regia, see: www.europeanaregia.eu.
Continued (EDM part) from 08-2012 - 01-2013 by Stefanie Gehrke without project affiliation. Further development planned in the Biblissima project, see: http://www.biblissima-condorcet.fr.
More modules and detailed description will follow soon.

For further documentation please see
http://diglib.hab.de/rules/documentation/ER/v1.1/Europeana-Regia_D2.3_Vademecum-for-librarians.pdf and the PDF-document by the same author as the transformation in the download section.
summary: XSLTs: Check manuscript metadata before ingestion into Europeana / TEL
